description: Conversion of 2 flats into single family dwelling; erection of single storey rear extension to basement; new front door to front elevation; reinstate original openings to first floor front windows and replacement of windows, alterations to rear window openings, new roof light to rear roof slope
decision_conditions: <div>A scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the extension is occupied and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with current best practices.&nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-e44de5d7-7fff-9ca8-bee3-c4fc07f2f51b"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To reduce the risks from surface water flooding.</span></span></div>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Full details, and photo samples naming the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-dbf6888a-7fff-9277-2461-703b0d0c1465"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area</span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">A drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150 mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4541206c-7fff-0ca9-1626-d4fb1f684729"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To protect and where possible enhance biodiversity leading to net gain.</span></span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to occupation of the dwelling house hereby approved full details of 3 cycle parking spaces including location, storage, and material shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing. The cycle parking spaces/store shall be implemented prior to occupation in accordance with the approved details and retained and maintained in perpetuity</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-160eb222-7fff-9478-4c4e-263541634690"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To promote sustainable transport by prioritising cycling in the Borough and that the details of the cycle store is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cad08e95-7fff-0cea-702d-4d5be6df9624"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">a) Details of windows:-</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;i) annotated elevation drawings of the building with the windows to be replaced and to be installed identified by number and letter (e.g. W03 etc);</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;ii) 1:20 elevation drawings of each window type, with 1:5 section drawings showing the top, bottom, side and meeting rails, glazing bars and the location and dimension of the glazing; and 1:5 elevation drawings of windows horns (if any</span>);</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">iii) Details of door&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">iv) Details of materials </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-ec407c98-7fff-02f8-9124-1acc83294831"></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>
